author: BBC News
title: The private notes and secret documents that tell the inside story of the UK's Covid response
description: The Covid inquiry is set to publish its second set of findings looking in detail at the huge political decisions that had to be made in 2020.
content:
On WhatsApp Johnson's closest aides complain about his decision-making, external using an emoji of a broken trolly as he appears to swerve from one policy position to another.
